title: FIZZU Soda Can Series

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: FIZZU is a concept soda brand featuring bold, unexpected flavours brought to life through playful, graphic packaging. The goal of this project was to design a cohesive can series that stands out on shelf while keeping each flavour instantly recognizable.
overview.extended_description: The visual system uses strong colour blocking, simple illustrations, and flowing linework to suggest movement, fizz, and flavour. Each can follows the same structure, while distinct palettes and ingredient-inspired graphics differentiate Ponzu Zing, Kewpie Pop, and Ginger Zinger at a glance. All designs were built directly on a shrink sleeve can dieline, integrating required packaging elements such as nutritional information, barcode, bilingual text, and volume markings. Final artwork was applied to realistic mockups to reflect real-world production and retail context.

problem.title: The Challenge
problem.description: Create a cohesive soda brand that stands out in a crowded beverage market while communicating unique, Asian-inspired flavours through visual design alone.

objectives: Design a recognizable brand identity system
Create distinct visual language for each flavour
Ensure shelf impact and brand recognition

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Developed a bold visual system using graphic illustrations, flowing linework, and strong color blocking. Each can features ingredient-inspired graphics that communicate flavour while maintaining brand consistency.
approach: Established consistent brand structure across all flavours
Used colour psychology to convey flavour profiles
Designed custom illustrations for each ingredient
Integrated all required packaging elements into cohesive design

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: A cohesive visual language that balances playfulness with sophistication

outcomes.title: Results
outcomes.description: Created a cohesive three-can series that successfully balances playful illustration with professional packaging standards. The designs demonstrate strong shelf presence while maintaining brand consistency.
achievements: Cohesive brand system across three distinct flavours
Professional integration of all packaging requirements
Strong visual differentiation at point of purchase

learnings: Balancing creative expression with functional packaging constraints
Importance of color psychology in flavour communication
Technical requirements of shrink sleeve can production
Creating visual hierarchy within limited surface area
